test.name: S_TC-001 not verify email Login-Tap broadcast

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.msg: Keyword 'Capture Page Screenshot' could not be run on failure: No application is open

WebDriverException: Message: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. Original error: Error executing adbExec. Original error: 'Command 'C:\\Users\\tanak\\AppData\\Local\\Android\\Sdk\\platform-tools\\adb.exe -P 5037 -s 5c02860 shell 'settings put global hidden_api_policy_pre_p_apps 1;settings put global hidden_api_policy_p_apps 1;settings put global hidden_api_policy 1'' exited with code 1'; Command output: error: protocol fault (couldn't read status): connection reset

verify login with not verify email
Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Check popup and accept 1 only use now
Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.
kw.msg: WebDriverException: Message: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. Original error: 'GET /screenshot' cannot be proxied to UiAutomator2 server because the instrumentation process is not running (probably crashed). Check the server log and/or the logcat output for more details

Keyword 'Capture Page Screenshot' could not be run on failure: WebDriverException: Message: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. Original error: 'GET /screenshot' cannot be proxied to UiAutomator2 server because the instrumentation process is not running (probably crashed). Check the server log and/or the logcat output for more details
WebDriverException: Message: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. Original error: Could not proxy command to the remote server. Original error: read ECONNRESET
